SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_login_log (username, ip, location, create_time, device) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_login_log set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device = #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, ip, location, create_time, device from tb_login_log
